price: 8. Qofkii falana xumaan le’eg saxar wuu arki.
arabic: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٖ شَرّٗا يَرَهُۥ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waman yaʿmal mith'qāla dharratin sharran yarahu
